attributes.action: To build a underground/tube train network in the south and south east London.
attributes.additional_details: It’s unfair on the residents of these areas in the south and south east London areas to have such poor commuting times. It devalues resident’s quality of life and runs down the areas too. Rail strikes aggravate it even more due to lack of options. Not everyone can work remotely.
attributes.background: To bridge the gap in underground transportation in South and south east london by extending the Tube network.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the London public transport network. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
